title: Rubber in building
brief_description: Illustrates the many ways in which rubber can be employed in building processes: tyres, conveyor belts and hoses used in contractors equipment; extractable rubber core used in the pre-stressing of concrete beams; sound proofing system of floating floor construction using rubber under floor battens etc.
